Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 95th/Eggleston
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses rerouted EB: 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, & 95th; WB: 95th, into Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, & 95th near 95th/Eggleston.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 95th/Eggleston, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th, Halsted, 87th, Lafayette, and 95th.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th, into Terminal, State, 87th, Halsted, and 95th.

Allow extra travel time.
